title: The Best Black Friday 2018 Tech Deals!
description: Xbox One X for $400 on Amazon:  Xbox One S w/ Minecraft for $200 on Amazon:  PS4 Slim with Spider-Man for $200 at Gamestop:  PS4 Pro with Red Dead Redemption 2 for $400 at Best Buy:  PlayStation 4 Wireless Controller for $39 on Amazon:  Xbox One Wireless Controller for $47 on Amazon:  PlayStation VR bundle for $200 on Amazon:  Nintendo Switch with Mario Kart 8 Deluxe for $300 at Best Buy:  The Switch is also at Kohl's for $330 with a carrying case, Turtle Beach headset and $90 of Kohl's cash but it's only in store.  COMPUTERS Microsoft Surface Pro 6 with Type Cover for $800 at the Microsoft Store:  Microsoft Surface Go for $450 on Amazon:  Google Pixelbook for $700 at the Google Store:  Acer Aspire 7 gaming laptop for $980 at Newegg:  Acer Nitro 5 for $520 at Best Buy (live on Black Friday):   FUN STUFF 500GB Samsung T5 SSD for $100 on Amazon:  32" Samsung 4K FreeSync monitor for $350 on Amazon:  Apple HomePod for $250 at Best Buy (live on Black Friday):  Google Chromecast + Home Mini Bundle for $45 at Google Store (live on the 22nd):  Sony A7ii with kit lens for $1000 on Amazon:   PHONES Samsung Galaxy S9 for $520 on Amazon:  Samsung Galaxy Note 9 for $800 on Amazon:  Google Pixel 3 for $650 and Pixel 3 XL for $700 at the Google Store (live on the 22nd):  128GB iPad Mini 4 for $250 at Best Buy (live on Black Friday):   TVs Toshiba 50" 4K Fire TV for $300 on Amazon (live on the 22nd):  LG 65" 4K TV for $600 at Best Buy:  Vizio 70" 4K TV for $750 at Best Buy:    By using our Amazon affiliate links, you help to support the channel as we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Check out our new channel!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
